Moving on, the 131hp turbo-petrol engine is available only on the top four trims - RevX A, AX5 L, AX7 and AX7 L. 📊 Mahindra XUV 3XO Analysis Report

🎯 Executive Summary

The Mahindra XUV 3XO is a compact SUV launched by Mahindra & Mahindra. It offers a range of features including a bold design, comfortable interiors, and advanced technology. It comes in multiple variants with petrol and diesel engine options. Prices start at ₹7.99 lakh and go up to ₹15.80 lakh. The vehicle aims to disrupt the compact SUV category with its design, safety features, performance, and technology.

✨ Key Features

  • Design: Bold and athletic silhouette with ivory-colored interiors.
  • Seating: SUV command seating for better visibility.
  • Safety: 35 standard safety features including 6 airbags and ESC.
  • Engines: World-class turbocharged petrol and diesel engines.
  • Technology: Skyroof, dual-zone climate control, and Level 2 ADAS.

⚙️ Technical Specifications

Based on the provided data, here are the technical specifications of the Mahindra XUV 3XO:

  • Engine Options:
    • 1.2L Turbo Petrol (111hp, 200Nm)
    • 1.2L TGDI Petrol (131hp, 230Nm)
    • 1.5L Diesel (117hp, 300Nm)
  • Transmission: 6-speed manual, 6-speed automatic (petrol), 6-speed AMT (diesel)
  • Dimensions:
    • Length: 3990 mm
    • Width: 1821 mm
    • Height: 1647 mm
    • Wheelbase: 2600 mm
  • Fuel Tank Capacity: 42 liters

🚗 Variant Details

The Mahindra XUV 3XO is available in multiple variants, including:

  • MX1
  • RevX M
  • RevX M(O)
  • MX2
  • MX2 Pro
  • MX3
  • MX3 Pro
  • AX5
  • AX5L
  • AX7
  • AX7L

Each variant offers a different set of features and engine options. The top-end variants include advanced features like Level 2 ADAS and premium audio systems.

💰 Pricing Information

The Mahindra XUV 3XO is priced between ₹7.99 lakh and ₹15.80 lakh (ex-showroom India). Prices vary depending on the variant and engine option.

🛡️ Safety Features

The Mahindra XUV 3XO comes with a comprehensive suite of safety features, including:

  • 6 airbags
  • Electronic Stability Control (ESC)
  • Hill Hold Control (HHC)
  • All 4 Disc Brakes
  • 3-point seat belts for all passengers

➕ Additional Features

Other notable features of the Mahindra XUV 3XO include:

  • Skyroof
  • Dual Zone Climate Control
  • 65W USB-C charging
  • Electronic Parking Brake with Auto Hold
  • 3 Smart Steering Modes
  • Twin HD Screens (26.03 cm infotainment and digital cluster)
  • Harman Kardon Premium Audio with amplifier & Sub-woofer
  • 360-degree surround view system with blind view monitor

⚔️ Competitive Positioning

The Mahindra XUV 3XO competes with other compact SUVs in the market. It aims to disrupt the category with its unique combination of design, safety, performance, and technology. The key selling points include its advanced features, powerful engine options, and competitive pricing.
